group.note: As of August 6, 2003 the SlopGenerator (Simple Line Oriented Parser) is functional but somewhat limited. RFC822 parsing does not properly take continuation lines (like "by..." after Received-From) into account, and a specific rfc822 mode should be implemented to avoid parsing the message body. On the other hand, the code is very simple and thus should be quite fast.
